jcr:root.jcr:title: Ashanti Nomad
jcr:root.features:
• Medium weight 99-to-1 cotton/lycra blend
  • Uses our patented "wick-weave" design
  • Odor-resistant
  • Available in five colors: sandstorm brown, fire engine red, sky blue, ice white and obsidian black
  • "No-tags". No annoying tags to scratch or catch
  • Easy-wash- Guaranteed not to shrink in the dryer
  • Double stitched for durability
  • Available in sizes XS to XXL
jcr:root.summary: The Ashanti is a great looking tee made from high-quality, durable material. We have put this shirt through a battery of tests and it has stood up well: no shrinking, staining or fading. The medium-weight fabric keeps its shape well and retains a soft comfortable feel even after many washings. The fit is relaxed for all-day wear. Soft jersey-knit taping on the neck seam. Straight hem. Durable double-needle stitching. Tagless printed label for added comfort. 6 oz. jersey-knit fabric. Imported. Machine wash and dry.
